paper.title: Selecting system development tools: some experiences

author.org: LisSc(Econ) Turku School of Economics and Business Administration Sampo Insurance Company Limited

paper.venue: Conference on Advanced Information Systems Engineering
paper.abstract: Case-tool market is quite unstructured and not mature. It is no wonder that buyers are more than blurred. Several acquisitions have so far been based on false or insufficient data, which has led to lost money and other resources.
